articles.content: New Delhi: Pesticides and agrochemicals manufacturer UPL on Monday reported a 28.54 per cent rise in the consolidated to Rs 877 crore in the quarter ended June 30, 2022, compared with Rs 677 crore in… [+1869 chars]

articles.author: Mansi Verma
articles.title: Layoffs at agritech startup DeHaat less than a year after large fundraise - Moneycontrol
articles.description: Founder and CEO Shashank Kumar confirms layoffs but says the number is not in triple digits. DeHaat raised $115 million in 2021 in what was the largest funding round for an Indian agritech startup.
articles.content: Agritech startup DeHaat has become the latest startup to resort to layoffs, less than a year after the company raised $115 million in what was the largest funding round for an Indian agricultural tec… [+2200 chars]
